EmailTemplate.name: 2015-Turkey ops conference APR-EMEAI-Event.Turkey Ops Conf Registration APR 2015
EmailTemplate.subject: Honeywell Regional Operators Conference
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Customer}}
Your registration for the Regional Operators Conference in Turkey has been received.
If you are able to attend, I look forward to welcoming you to the event on 27th April. If you require any further information about the event, the agenda or venue, please do not hesitate to contact me directly.
If you are unable to attend but would like further information on our range of products and services, please do not hesitate to contact me, and I would be delighted to arrange a separate meeting.
Jaroslav Hajecek Customer Support Manager
Honeywell Aerospace
